brief_title: Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Antitumor Activity of FCN-437c
brief_summary: This is a multicenter, open, single arm dose escalation and dose expansion clinical study to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics, and antitumor activity of FCN-437c alone or in combination with letrozole in women with ER +/ HER2 - advanced breast cancer.
